description:
All the features with more coverage. Made with a merino and nylon blend, the Wool Crew sock gives you temperature management and durability. Moisture wicking fabric and cushioning keep you comfortable and dry, to keep you shredding the pavement or trail.

  • Nylon and merino blend is odour resistant and quick drying
  • Infiknit™ gives durability to the sock for long lasting comfort
  • Heel and toe cushioning provide softness when you’re pushing hard
  • Feel360® technology wicks away moisture to keep your feet dry
  • Breathable mesh lets heat out to help your feet stay cool
  • Left/right engineered arch support delivers a precise fit
name: Stance Wool Crew St Run Socks - Unisex
